maqras.text: Zai ta zhihou, wo meiyou jiang tianshen qu chengzhi ta de zongzu, wo ye bu changchang jiang tianshen.
Cai tingjian yi sheng nahan, tamen jiu miewangle.
Ai zai zhong pu! Zhiyao you shizhe lai jiaohua tamen, tamen bian jiayi yunong.
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie bei huimie de shidai yong bu zhuan hui chenshi.
Tamen jiang tongtong bei jujin zai wo nali.
Tamen you yizhong jixiang: Yi si de dadi, wo shi ta fuhuo, wo shi ta shengzhang liangshi, yi zuo tamen de shipin.
Wo zai da dishang chuangzao xuduo ye zao yuan, putao yuan, wo shi xuduo yuanquan, cong di zhong yongchu,
yibian tamen shi qi guoshi. Zhexie guoshi bushi tamen de shou zao chulai de, nandao tamen bu ganxie me?
Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu! Ta chuangzao yiqie pei'ou, dimian suo shengchan de, tamen ziji, yiji tamen suo bu zhidao de, (dou you pei'ou).
Tamen you yizhong jixiang, wo shi baizhou tuoli heiye, tamen bian huran zai hei'an zhong.
Taiyang ji xing, zhi yiding suo, na shi wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu suo yuding de.
Yueliang, wo wei ta yuding xingsu, zhidao ta zai biancheng xiang ganku de ye zao zhi yiyang.
Taiyang bude zhuiji yueliang, heiye ye bude chaoyue baizhou, ge zai yige guidao shang fuyouzhe.
Tamen you yizhong jixiang: Wo shi tamen de zisun, chengzuo manzai de chuanbo.
Wo wei tamen er chuangzao xiang chuanbo nayang ke gong qi cheng de dongxi.
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiu ba tamen yan si, er tamen meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe, tamen jiang bu huo zhengjiu;
chufei shi yinwei wo de enhui, yinwei wo yao shi tamen xiangle zhi mou shi.
Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:`Nimen dang weiju zai nimen zhiqian de, he zai nimen zhihou de, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin.'
Mei feng tamen de zhu de yizhong jixiang lailin tamen, tamen bian beiqi ta.

Ruguo you shengyin dui tamen shuo:`Nimen yingdang fen she zhenzhu suo ciyu nimen de.'Namo, bu xindao zhe jiang dui xindao zhe shuo:`Zhenzhu yu gongyang shui jiu gongyang shui, women hebi gongyang ta ne? Nimen zhishi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.'
Tamen shuo:`Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.'
Tamen zhi dengdaizhuo yi sheng nahan, zai tamen fenzheng de shihou, xiji tamen;
tamen jianglai bu neng li yizhu, ye buneng hui jia qu.
Haojiao yi xiang, tamen jiu cong fenmu chulai, ben xiang tamen de zhu.
Tamen jiang shuo:`Shang zai women! Shui jiang women cong women de wo chu huanxing? Zhe shi zhiren zhu suo yingxu women de, shizhemen yi shuo shihuale.'
Cai tingjian yi sheng nahan, tamen jiu tongtong bei jujin zai wo zheli.
Zai na ri, renhe ren bu shou sihao wang qu; nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou.
Leyuan de jumin zai na ri que shi congshi yu yu le de.
Tamen he ziji de pei'ou, zai shu yin xia, kao zai chuangshang.
Tamen zai leyuan zhong, jiang you shuiguo, bing you tamen suo yaoqiu de endian.
`Ping'an!'Zhe shi cong zhi ci zhu fachu de zhuci.
`Fanzui de renmen ya! Jinri nimen dang tuibi dao yibian qu.
